title: Design Architecture for TypeInferenceEngine
description: Define the overall structure and modules of the advanced type inference engine.

title: Create RFC for TypeInferenceEngine Design
description: Draft a comprehensive Request For Comments (RFC) document detailing the proposed design of the advanced type inference engine, including supporting complex types, type-level programming, and addressing edge cases. The RFC should be detailed enough to facilitate discussion and decision making among the team.

title: Review RFC for TypeInferenceEngine Design
description: Review the RFC document and provide feedback on the proposed design of the advanced type inference engine.

title: Implement Core Functionality of TypeInferenceEngine
description: Develop the core functionality of the advanced type inference engine, supporting complex types and type-level programming.

title: Test Core Functionality of TypeInferenceEngine
description: Test the core functionality of the advanced type inference engine to ensure it works as intended.

title: Document Core Functionality of TypeInferenceEngine
description: Write clear and concise documentation for the core functionality of the advanced type inference engine.
